interpretation:
The Toilet card represents the act of elimination and release. It signifies the need to let go of what no longer serves us, whether that be physical waste or emotional baggage. This card reminds us that we must take care of our physical bodies through proper hygiene and cleanliness.

On a deeper level, the Toilet card can represent the need to cleanse ourselves of negative energy or toxic relationships. It encourages us to let go of anything that is holding us back from growth and progress.

When this card appears in a reading, it may suggest the need to pay attention to our physical health or to release emotional baggage. It can also indicate a time of transition or transformation, as we let go of the old and make room for the new.

Overall, the Toilet card reminds us that elimination and release are necessary for growth and progress. It encourages us to take care of our physical and emotional well-being, and to let go of anything that no longer serves us.
